posts.raw_content:
If we nuke it, and pass the SAVE act, secure elections, root out corruption and judicial overreach, we save our Country for another 100 - 300 years.  Sure, they will call us bad names and riot in the streets... again.  And some of us will get shot and killed.  Sadly.

But, failing to take this opportunity will be seen as weakness and cowardice.  They, the dems and liberal progressives, will pounce on us the second they get a chance.  We all know this.  They will claim they are doing so to "save democracy" and are doing "what the founders would have wanted!" (the same reasons we need to do it)  They will drive this message home, day in and day out, with the help of the media and higher education.  They will leave no doubt that killing the filibuster to permanently open our borders, freeing thousands from prisons, inviting the whole world into our Country, giving them permanent "universal basic income" and inserting DEI into EVERYTHING (to classify "whites" as untrustworthy and violent) is the only way forward.  Our Country is bleeding and hurt.  Letting the dems kill the filibuster themselves will be final strike; Lady America will not recover.

I know its not seen as "politically correct."  But fuck politically correct.  We have never been about politically correct. We are about making America great again, by ensuring freedom and prosperity to our own people, and in doing so, we help guide the world (but not by sending billions to everyone else).
